name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a QA Engineer with over 9 years of experience in software testing and quality assurance, I specialize in designing and implementing effective testing strategies to ensure product excellence. My strong skills in **automated testing frameworks** such as **Selenium** and **JUnit**, along with proficiency in **API testing** and **performance testing**, enable me to deliver high-quality software solutions. I have a proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance product reliability and user satisfaction, while mentoring and guiding junior QA engineers. I am dedicated to driving continuous improvement and ensuring technical excellence across all projects.

experience.responsibilities:
 Develop and implement QA strategies for **Java** based cloud applications, ensuring effective testing of Microservices and REST APIs.
 Collaborate with development teams to enhance application performance and stability through rigorous testing practices.
 Design and execute test cases for Hybrid-single Page Application developed using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React 17**, and **Redux 4.2.1**.
 Utilize **Node.js** and **MongoDB** for backend testing, ensuring seamless integration with front-end technologies.
 Validate user interface functionality and responsiveness on **Angular 14**, **HTML5**, **CSS**, and **Bootstrap**, confirming user-friendly interactions.
 Leverage **Jenkins** and **Ansible** for CI/CD processes, optimizing automation in deployment cycles for both dev and production environments.
 Monitor performance and stability of deployed applications, aiming for version control that ensures updates reflect a minimum of 99% uptime.
 Execute thorough regression and performance testing to maintain **multithreading** and **concurrency** efficiencies across applications.
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure adherence to best coding practices and quality standards, contributing to a 20% reduction in bug reports.

• Conducted thorough testing of web applications developed with **Spring MVC**, **React 12**, **Angular 12**, and **jQuery** to ensure quality and functionality.
• Developed automated test scripts to enhance testing efficiency and coverage for the user interface, focusing on responsiveness across **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **JavaScript** technologies.
• Collaborated with developers on the integration of testing frameworks within **Spring Boot Microservices** architecture, ensuring robust backend REST APIs accessibility.
• Participated in requirement gathering and design reviews to identify areas to enhance user experience across diverse browsers and devices.
• Actively contributed to improving application performance by testing and optimizing **AJAX** calls and real-time functionality with **Web Sockets**.
• Analyzed test results and reports to identify bugs and work closely with the development team for timely resolutions, ensuring the application meets established **quality standards**.
• Tracked and reported on software quality metrics, including bug counts and test coverage, leveraging tools used for **continuous integration** and testing.
• Engaged in regular training sessions to stay updated on new testing methodologies relevant to **JavaScript frameworks** and **front-end libraries**.

• Conducted extensive testing on web applications developed using **Spring MVC**, **jQuery**, **HTML**, **JavaScript**, **CSS**, **Material UI**, and **Tailwind CSS**, ensuring high-quality deliverables for **9** projects.
• Utilized **jQuery** for implementing client-side validation and enhancing user interface controls with a focus on performance improvement, reducing load time by **30%**.
• Collaborated with design teams to convert designs from Photoshop and Figma into responsive, table-less semantic XHTML and CSS, maintaining adherence to **W3C** standards across **10** applications.
• Developed and integrated CORS solutions using **Node.js**, along with RESTful services using **Node** and **Express**, achieving an API response time improvement of **25%**.
• Designed and implemented SSIS packages for efficient data transfer from flat file sources to **MS SQL Server**, streamlining data processing workflows.
• Gained proficiency in essential web technologies and tools including **Bower**, **NPM**, **Git**, as well as cloud services such as **AWS**, **Azure**, **GCP**, and **Heroku**, contributing to the advancement of deployment processes across **15** team projects.
